document_data.mainbody:
alnut oil was a type of vegetable oil in the Realms,
* Auroras Whole Realms Catalogue sold walnut oil at a standard price of two gold pieces per  in its "Auroras Larder" section, but also at a price of one gold piece per  in its "Priests Alcove" section under material components for divine magic spells.
Druids used this oil as a material component for the reflecting pool spell.
